text: The X-35 was designed by X-Yachts Design Team led by Niels Jeppesen and first launched in 2006. The class is recognised by the International Sailing Federation. ==Events== ===World Championships=== {| |- | 2007 Kiel | Cees Wieringa | Mark Richmond | Mati Sepp |- | 2008 Cala Galera |valign=top| Alberto Signorini |valign=top| Antonio Sodo Mingliori |valign=top| Mark Richmond |- | 2009 Kiel | Alessandro Solerio | Kimmo Vahatalo | Albert Kooijman |- | 2010 Scarlino | Franco Solerio | Enrico Mattia Pegoraro | Gianluca Vigano |- | 2011 Århus | Johan Lindell | Thomas Sørensen | Samuli Leisti |- | 2019 Malmö | Jacob Jacobsson | Raimondas Siugzdinis | Paolo Sena |- |} ==External links== * Official X-35 Class Association Website * Official X-Yachts Website * World Sailing X35 Microsite Website Category:Classes of World Sailing Category:Sailing yachts Category:2000s sailboat type designs Category:Sailboat type designs by Niels Jeppesen Category:Sailboat types built by x yachts
